meta.label: Esri geo enrichment
meta.description:
This plugin enriches data via the Esri(r) Acrgis.com(r) API. This plugin covers the following ESRI(r)'s API features:

* World Geocoding (single line and detailed address)
* Enrich from XY coordinates
* Enrich from Layer (like postcode).

In this plugin you will access to the Enrichment with your ArcGis online(r) login password
meta.author: Dataiku (Nicolas GAKRELIDZ)
